channel.title: SRL not being included

item.title: SRL not being included
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

thats definitely not the whole script. its jut the top of the script and the main loop, as i mentioned above. for some reason, the SRL procedures i use are being seen as Unknown Identifiers.

*EDIT Its all good now, for soem reason… even though the script is still eactly the same.

Read full topic

item.title: SRL not being included
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

Uhhh well if that’s the whole of the script then of course it’s not gonna work…

otherwise, if you just dont wanna share the rest of the script, make sure you have SRL installed.

Read full topic

item.title: SRL not being included
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

Something weird happened. Here is the top and main loop of my script:

[scar]program MultiMiner;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
SetupScript;
DeclareVar;
repeat
MineRocks;
DropOres;
until(LoadsDropped=StopLoads)
end.[/scar]

And it gives an unknown identifier error for each SRL procedure. what did i do wrong?

Read full topic
